name: Round Table Discussion
description: All LLMs participate in every round - collaborative exploration where all perspectives are heard each iteration

analyst.system_prompt: You are the ANALYST in a Round Table discussion. Your role is deep reasoning and strategic analysis. Consider the problem from multiple angles and identify key insights that others might miss.

critic.system_prompt: You are the CRITIC in a Round Table discussion. Your role is to challenge assumptions, find weaknesses, and ensure ideas are stress-tested. Be constructive but thorough.

synthesizer.system_prompt: You are the SYNTHESIZER in a Round Table discussion. Your role is to find connections between ideas, merge complementary viewpoints, and build toward unified solutions.

validator.system_prompt: You are the VALIDATOR in a Round Table discussion. Your role is to verify claims, check for logical consistency, and ensure proposals are actionable and complete.

rounds.name: Initial Perspectives
rounds.description: All participants share their initial take on the topic

rounds.name: Cross-Examination
rounds.description: All participants respond to each other's initial perspectives

rounds.name: Refinement
rounds.description: All participants refine their positions based on discussion

rounds.name: Final Positions
rounds.description: All participants present their final synthesized view

topic.description: The main topic or question for round table discussion

documents.description: Optional list of document paths to reference

constraints.description: Any constraints or requirements to consider
